rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 5 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 5:43 PM, 22 June 2025(Sunday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Pampanga, Metro Manila, Rizal and Laguna within the next 2 hours.



Intense to torrential rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in Tarlac(Pura, Victoria, Tarlac City, La Paz, Moncada, Anao, San Manuel, Gerona, Santa Ignacia, San Jose, Capas), Nueva Ecija(Licab, Quezon, Aliaga, Santo Domingo, Guimba, Llanera, Cabanatuan, General Mamerto Natividad, Talavera, Bongabon, Rizal, Laur, Palayan, Gabaldon, General Tinio, Penaranda, Santa Rosa, Gapan, Cuyapo), Bataan(Dinalupihan, Hermosa, Morong, Bagac, Mariveles), Zambales(Castillejos, San Antonio, Subic), Cavite(Naic, Ternate, Maragondon, General Emilio Aguinaldo, Indang, Magallanes, Alfonso, Tagaytay, Mendez), Batangas(Laurel, Nasugbu, Calaca, Balayan, Santa Teresita, Alitagtag, Cuenca, Bauan, San Jose, San Pascual, San Luis, Batangas City, Lobo, San Juan), Bulacan(Dona Remedios Trinidad, San Miguel) and Quezon(General Nakar, Real, Infanta) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
